sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"aws-certified-sysops-administrator"}}>{`AWS Certified SysOps Administrator`}</MDXTag>
{/* TOC */}
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#aws-certified-sysops-administrator"}}>{`AWS Certified SysOps Administrator`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#awssys-1-monitoring-metrics-and-analysis"}}>{`AWSSYS-1: Monitoring, Metrics and Analysis`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#-----awssys-11-cloudwatch-intro"}}>{`---- AWSSYS-1.1: CloudWatch Intro`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#-----awssys-12-ec2-status-troubleshooting"}}>{`---- AWSSYS-1.2: EC2 Status Troubleshooting`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#awssys-5-opsworks"}}>{`AWSSYS-5: Opsworks`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#-----awssys-51-opsworks-overview"}}>{`---- AWSSYS-5.1: Opsworks Overview`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#-----awssys-52-setting-up-opsworks"}}>{`---- AWSSYS-5.2: Setting up Opsworks`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
{/* /TOC */}
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"awssys-1-monitoring-metrics-and-analysis"}}>{`AWSSYS-1: Monitoring, Metrics and Analysis`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"-----awssys-11-cloudwatch-intro"}}>{`---- AWSSYS-1.1: CloudWatch Intro`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`It's a monitoring service to monitor the resources and what you run on AWS.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`EC2`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`DynamoDB`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`RDS DB instances etc`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Log files`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Host Level metrics`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`CPU`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Network`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Disk`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Status Check`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`RAM utilisation is a custom metric. You need to write Perl script for this.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`By default, monitoring is 5 minutes. Detailed monitoring is 1 minute.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`How long are metrics stored?`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`By default, for 2 weeks. You can use the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`GetMetricsStatistics API`}</MDXTag>{` or third party tools to have access to data for longer.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can retrieve data on terminated ELBs or instances for up to 2 weeks after it's termination.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Metric Granularity`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Many default metrics are 1 minute, but it can be 3 or 5 too. The minimum that you can have it 1 minute.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Alarms`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can use this to monitor any metric. You can even use it for something like bills etc too.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can also set the appropriate action and thresholds.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"-----awssys-12-ec2-status-troubleshooting"}}>{`---- AWSSYS-1.2: EC2 Status Troubleshooting`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`On the console, you can see the status check from the EC2 panel.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`There is a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`System Status Check`}</MDXTag>{` or `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Instance Status Check`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`What is the difference?`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`System = physical host (the actual physical machine)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Instance = VM itself`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Difference troubleshooting for the different status checks.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`System status checks`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`It will come up as an error if you have:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Loss of network connectivity`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Loss of system power`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Software issues on the physical host`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Hardware issues on the physical host`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Best way to resolve issues is to stop and then start the VM again`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Instance status checks`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Failed system status checks`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Exhausted memory`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Misconfigured networking or startup configuration`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Exhausted memory`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Corrupted file system`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Incompatible kernel`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Best way to trouble shoot is by `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`rebooting the instance`}</MDXTag>{` or by making modifications in your operating system`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="hr" components={components}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"awssys-5-opsworks"}}>{`AWSSYS-5: Opsworks`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"-----awssys-51-opsworks-overview"}}>{`---- AWSSYS-5.1: Opsworks Overview`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`All these groups of related resources are known as a stack.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`A stack could be like a Route53 pointing to a load balancer that points to EC2 instances which all point to a DB server.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Amazon Definition`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`An app management service that helps you automate operational tasks using Chef. It gives you the flexibility to define the application architecture.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Layman Definition`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Chef turns infrastructure into code. You can automate how you build, deploy and manage your infrastructure. Chef server stores all the recipes and the nodes will periodically polls Chef server to bring everything up to date.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`OpsWorks is a GUI to deploy and configure your infrastructure quickly. It consists of Stacks and Layers.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`A stack is a container (or group) of resources. A layer exists within a stack. When you create a layer, you use OpsWorks to configure that layer for you.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Layers`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`1 or more layers in a stack`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`An instance must be assigned to at least 1 layer`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Which chef layers run are determined by the layer the instance belongs to`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Preconfigured Layers include: - Applications - Databases - Load Balancers - Caching`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"-----awssys-52-setting-up-opsworks"}}>{`---- AWSSYS-5.2: Setting up Opsworks`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`From the AWS dashboard, we're going to create a stack and bring up a webpage without having to SSH.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Jump onto OpsWorks and add a stack. We can choose things like whether or not we want SSH access etc.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`After creating a stack, we will be brought back to the main screen. Now, let's create some layers!`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Layers`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`We can choose our types! We'll select PHP App Server for now. From here, you can add an instance.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`When adding, you can use existing OpsWorks to see how everything looks and use existing EC2 instances etc.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Then you can select to start the instance and go from there.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Apps`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`In the apps section, set up a new app! You need to select the application source (eg git etc) and go from there.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Once the app is live, we will push the app out to the instance.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`We can then click deploy and let the app deploy.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Once it has been deployed, you can then see the app running in the browser.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Deleting`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`To teardown the stack, you need to stop the instance and apps first and then remove things like the layers from there.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Also note, you also need to delete all of the security groups after and do it all manually (in the update, you can now do it by selecting the entire security group.)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="hr" components={components}></MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
